thread.title: Griffin Sestili set to visit Virginia this weekend
thread.title_full: Griffin Sestili set to visit Virginia this weekend

title: Griffin Sestili set to visit Virginia this weekend
text: Griffin Sestili set to visit Virginia this weekend Ed O'Brien PaPreps.com Recruiting Analyst Late last week, North Allegheny High School tight end Griffin Sestili announced via his twitter that he had received his first offer from Virginia : Thankful and excited to say I have received an offer from the University of Virginia #GoCavaliers pic.twitter.com/wEkj4Vtm3E Per Sestili's father, Griffin Sestili, currently a junior, will be taking a visit to Virginia this upcoming weekend to watch the Cavaliers play against Syracuse.Below are highlights of Griffin Sestili against Upper St. Clair High School (PA):
